comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Husband was governor of Indiana, and a US Senator: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Samuel_M._Ralston This would be his second wife, Jennie Craven Ralston (1861-1954); they had three children together. In the 1920s after she was widowed, she served as a delegate to the Democratic National Convention from Indiana, several times, and was a member of the Democratic National Committee.
